experience.title: Product Specialist
experience.description: At K12, I worked on a project to develop a homeschooling kit for children between 2 and 6 years old named SparkleBox.School ( Lead a team of product specialists and early year learning counsellors- Worked upon the educational framework and curriculum taught to the children- B2C sales: Over 1000 users enrolled with SparkleBox.School in a time span of 10 months- I worked with the sales and marketing team to establish the product in the market- Worked with multiple teams to launch the product in the market on time, provide efficient customer service and maintain customer relations through our counsellors- Working closely with the tech team to set up the platform for the product for digital content, videos and live sessions
